item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to my site! This website details data analysis projects created by me using resources such as R, the most recent of these projects involving genomics research in mouse gastrulation.

item.title: Project: Investigating Mdh1â€™s Involvement In Suppressing Cell Proliferation In Mouse Gastrulation
